      • hasSelector

                                  String searchedSelector)

        Parameters:
        request - SlingHttpServletRequest
        searchedSelector - String with Selector to search for.
        Returns:

      • getSelectors

      • getSelector

        public static String getSelector(@Nonnull
                                 org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request,
                                 int selectorIndex,
                                 String defaultValue)
        Looks for a selector by index.
        Parameters:
        request - the request to look at
        selectorIndex - the index of the selector to be returned
        defaultValue - the value that is returned if no valid selector is found (not selectors, or not enough selectors)
        Returns:
        the selector with the given index, or defaultValue if not found

        Parameters:

        defaultValue - the value that is returned if no valid selector is found (not selectors, or not enough selectors)
        Returns:
        the selector with the given index, or defaultValue if not found

                                                   org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request)

        request - the request
        Returns:
        the value of the given parameter name or an empty string if it does not exits

      • hasParameter

        public static boolean hasParameter(String parameterName,
                                   org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request)
        Returns true, if the request has the given parameter. False otherwise. Returns false if either parameter is null or parameterName is blank.
        Parameters:
        parameterName - parameter to lookup
        request - request to check
        Returns:
        true, if the request has the given parameter. False otherwise.

        Parameters:

        elementName - Form element name
        Returns:
